ca.mcgill.ecse211.settings

Class Setting

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.settings.Setting

  • public class Setting
extends java.lang.Object
    General information related to the game. Received from the server.
    Since:
    1.5
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Team 2
